dependencies.description:
DendroPy is a Python library for phylogenetic computing. It provides
classes and functions for the simulation, processing, and manipulation
of phylogenetic trees and character matrices, and supports the reading
and writing of phylogenetic data in a range of formats, such as NEXUS,
NEWICK, NeXML, Phylip, FASTA, etc.
dependencies.name: py-dendropy

dependencies.description:
This is a python version of the popular glmnet library (beta release).
Glmnet fits the entire lasso or elastic-net regularization path for
linear regression, logistic and multinomial regression models, poisson
regression and the cox model.
dependencies.name: py-glmnet-python

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Python wrapper -- and more -- for Aaron Quinlan's BEDTools
dependencies.name: py-pybedtools

dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
dependencies.name: py-pysam

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Statistical computations and models for use with SciPy
dependencies.name: py-statsmodels

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description: Sequence Elements Enrichment Analysis (SEER), python implementation
name: py-pyseer
